channel.title: Gay's bi sexuals
channel.description:
Do you guys hate GAYS - BI sexuals? or are you 1 of em, just tell it or say the reason. or do you just love girls
Dont be shy to tell it
Im idk im thinkin about it im true now you guys .
I dont want any hate or flame,
Discuss please?

item.title: Gay's bi sexuals
item.dc:creator: @The_Reaper_X The Reaper X
item.description:
@The_Reaper_X wrote:

Provoking flame towards other preferences while suggesting not to flame? I don’t really know why this hasn’t been locked already, nor do I care. But if you’re considering that this isn’t wrong then maybe you should consider restructuring your discussion, because at the moment it seems to be held in the light of a 5 year old.

item.title: Gay's bi sexuals
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“Epic Steve, post:55, topic:394849”][quote author=Marine5287 link=topic=492039.msg3598315#msg3598315 date=1305333441]

[quote author=MistaBigBoss link=topic=492039.msg3598311#msg3598311 date=1305333353]

[quote author=Marine5287 link=topic=492039.msg3598307#msg3598307 date=1305333276]

Here it is, I hate gays and bi’s. I’m Armenian and Armenians are Orthodox. If people see a gay in Armenia they beat the shit out of him. Why? Because gays go into the laws of nature. Nature/God made men to love women and propagate.[/quote]

If god made gays, and god is perfect and everything he does is right, I guess that makes god a little bit gay too, doesn’t it?
[/quote]God is not perfect, he has his mistakes too.

Please learn religion before you come on here and say shit like that.
[/quote]I don’t have to learn religion to know that gays are not accepted with katholics, protestants and orthodox’s.

“Catholics” and I was talking about when you said God makes mistakes. He does not.

If this “God” of yours is so perfect… Why is there bad in this world? Why is there murder? etc. etc. If this so-called “God” of yours exists, why doesn’t he do anything to change it? My point is; Haven’t seen it, can’t touch it, doesn’t exist.[/quote]
I believe god gave us our own choices, therefor if a person wants to kill a person he could if he wanted to.

Read full topic

item.title: Gay's bi sexuals
item.dc:creator: @Svitkona Svitkona
item.description:
@Svitkona wrote:

[quote=“xx matty xx, post:174, topic:394849”][quote author=ytuio9 link=topic=492039.msg3604674#msg3604674 date=1305992515]

[quote author=Jc22493 link=topic=492039.msg3604144#msg3604144 date=1305929929]

[quote author=xryz link=topic=492039.msg3603426#msg3603426 date=1305842538]

Nobody is “born” gay.[/quote]

I beg to differ. There have been studies that provide evidence for genetic factors. Of course, there is no one gene that does all the work.
[/quote]There is studies that say global warming is real, and I yet to see it.

Exactly global warming just a scam and the studies saying it was real were fraud. I highly doubt gayness can be genetic. The only way it could be genetic is if u were suppose to be the opposite sex that u are.

i’m pretty sure there’s no ‘gay gene’ lol, but there has to be some genetic factor to it.

Yeah but it has to do with your chromosomes. Sperm cells contain half the genetic material, and egg cells do as well. Sperm cells can provide X and Y chromosomes, but egg cells only provide X chromosomes. If you get XX, it’s a female, if it’s XY, it’s a male. Now sometimes an error happens and you get an XXY, which is kind of half and half. It doesn’t make you gay, just transsexual.
Can anyone verify this info as this is what they teach us at school
[/quote]If genetics do influence homosexuality, then it would rarely have anything to do with X/Y chromosomes - it’d be much more complicated. Personally, I believe it’s partly influenced by environmental factors, and partly genetic.[/quote]
Never said it automatically made them gay, I was just trying to say something about transsexuals

Read full topic

item.title: Gay's bi sexuals
item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

You can either be born gay, or choose to be gay. Just because both of your parents may have been gay doesn’t mean you will turn out gay. People choose to be gay because of something they experience with the opposite sex that may turn them of that gender for good. People can be born gay because of their hormones; they don’t choose the way their hormones go, their body does.

Read full topic

i’m pretty sure there’s no ‘gay gene’ lol, but there has to be some genetic factor to it.

Yeah but it has to do with your chromosomes. Sperm cells contain half the genetic material, and egg cells do as well. Sperm cells can provide X and Y chromosomes, but egg cells only provide X chromosomes. If you get XX, it’s a female, if it’s XY, it’s a male. Now sometimes an error happens and you get an XXY, which is kind of half and half. It doesn’t make you gay, just transsexual.
Can anyone verify this info as this is what they teach us at school[/quote]If genetics do influence homosexuality, then it would rarely have anything to do with X/Y chromosomes - it’d be much more complicated. Personally, I believe it’s partly influenced by environmental factors, and partly genetic.
